sentences.sContent: Do you believe that men are not naturally monogamous?
sentences.sCn: 你相信男人天生就不是单一性伴侣的吗？

remMethod.val: mono(单个) + gam(婚姻) + ous → 单一婚姻的 → 一夫一妻制的

words.tran: 一夫一妻制；[动] 单配偶，[动] 单配性

trans.tranCn: 一夫一妻制的； 单配的
trans.tranOther: Someone who is monogamous or who has a monogamous relationship has a sexual relationship with only one partner
